column4: Can anyone here help me with the trouble I'm having with Totem?
what's happening is that Totem is freezing (no errors) at random points during audio playback.
Not playing audio now. No output from --debug
check if the settings in gstreamer-properties are correct
does it happen with all format or ...
It appears to happen with all formats. Tried with .ogg (Ogg Vorbis Audio) and .MP3, known-good files.
Could you help point me in the right direction to getting it to work?
That gave me quite a few errors.
Repeated the following lines: "PaHost_OpenStream: could not open /dev/dsp for O_WRONLY" and "PaHost_OpenStream: ERROR - result = -10000"
Closed firefox and getting sound from espeak command, but still no Totem playback for .ogg files
No error from .ogg files - Totem just freezes. Also not finding Sound Output in Preferences, unless you mean the number of channels.
did reinstall of Totem (sudo apt-get install --reinstall totem), and still freezes
reinstalled gstreamer plugins and still no playback through totem.
Haven't done a build-dep for any of the gstreamer, but everything that I do have has been installed decently.
